data.text: Since 2016 I am staying in this hotel but now I decided not to continue staying in your hotel, As a loyal customer you always expect extra ordinary services which was not delivered in my last stay, in the past the front desk staff was so courageous and friendly but now its totally different it seems that guest is not paying but the host is paying for your stay, I cancelled my April booking and move to another hotel, I need respect for me and my gust which I didn't not find this time
data.title: My bad Experience

data.text:
Whenever we go for pilgrimage tour, we choose Dubai as base and take trips to Medinah, Mecca, Iraq, Iran, Syria. First we complete our Jetleg in Dubai and then take trips.
This year we selected Hotel Flora Creek Deluxe Hotel near citi Center Dubai. Right from the day we checked in on January 02,2024, till we left them on March 05,2024, we got excellent, excellent, excellent treatment from checkin, allotment of room, room service, assistance in making our stay, sightseeing, food were all excellent.
Checking out was also great leaving the best possible impressions on us.
We should say Brother Ahmed, you are the best leader with best possible team from reception, bell boys, security staff, house keepers, cleaning staff all are great.
Shall surely recommend your hotel to our friends and families.
data.title: Excellent, Excellent, Excellent

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for taking the time to post your positive feedback on Tripadvisor.

I am thrilled that you had an “excellent” overall experience at our hotel and I am very happy that you found our food offering excellent and that your arrival and departure experience met your expectations.

Furthermore, I am very proud to read your encouraging feedback regarding our family members with a special mention for Ahmed, Front Desk team, Concierge, Security and Housekeeping team.

I will be sure to thank the team personally for their continued commitment to driving excellence and we look forward to welcoming you back for another memorable stay.

Warm Regards, 

Anura Mathai
Director – New Initiative
owner_response.author: Anura Mathai

data.text: The entire experience was just great for my whole months stay. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. The staff were all very friendly and helpful. Its in a great location that is close to the metro and the City Center Shopping Mall. Plus I had a nice view over the Creek
data.title: Great stay

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
 
Thank you for sharing your most encouraging feedback with the Tripadvisor Community.             
                                  
I am delighted that you had a positive overall stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back for another visit in the near future.
 
Warm Regards,

Anura Mathai
Director – New Initiative
owner_response.author: Anura Mathai

data.text:
We had the best experience with family. The rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Has all the basic necessities. I was very impressed to see how they took care of every minute details.

The staff is very kind. Special shoutout to Mohammed Ashraf for taking care of us. He went above and beyond with his services to assist our family.
data.title: Spacious room and very kind staff

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

I will be sure to thank the team personally for their continued commitment to driving excellence and we look forward to welcoming you back for another visit in the near future.

Warm Regards, 

Anura Mathai

data.text: One of the best hotel apartments in Deira area of Dubai. Great location beside Metro station plus DCC mall. Very clean rooms and suits, very spacious areas inside, all amenities u can expect at room , I have never been disappointed using same hotel every visit to Dubai for maximum quality of hotel apartments type of living during my trip.
data.title: Excellent hotel apartments.
